name: places/ChIJVYhCahL1wokRLPDTFmNdTIU
formattedAddress: 2547 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2547 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: We got a feta cheese panini, a large potato Borekka, a cheese borekka, a small limonana. Pricing wasn't bad, service was fast. Overall I didn't feel like they were trying to do anything special, just serve coffee and bagels. Seating was bar-style which is kinda annoying, but I guess that's in the title.

text.text: We got a feta cheese panini, a large potato Borekka, a cheese borekka, a small limonana. Pricing wasn't bad, service was fast. Overall I didn't feel like they were trying to do anything special, just serve coffee and bagels. Seating was bar-style which is kinda annoying, but I guess that's in the title.

originalText.text: I see pretty much everyone wrote that their service is great. I didn’t have that experience.  We came at 4:30 (and closing time it seems is 6, rather than 7 as appears here). They were out of whole wheat bagels of either kind except for one of each (plain whole wheat and whole wheat with seeds). I think it is kind of early to be out of them, and the reaction was “they eat whole wheat?!” Yes, we all eat whole wheat. I came with my two grandsons who took the remaining two (fortunately one of the kids is OK with the seeds). I also wanted three bagels to go, and two of them were for people who weren’t there. So I had to check what they wanted instead (there were whole wheat baguettes and a whole wheat wrap). We were the only people in the store, but you’d think there was a whole line of people in back of us with the impatience - is that it? What else do you want? I needed to check. Have a minute’s patience. Also, the fellow making the sandwiches (one made the sandwiches, one was ringing up the order) said he couldn’t hear me, “take off your mask”. Two times he told me to take off my mask. Well, I’m a senior and preferred to keep it on. People don’t have trouble hearing me through my mask. I told him to turn the music down for a moment and he’d hear me. Then he did that. But I also told him he should be more tolerant of a person with a mask. He could have thought to turn the music down and even come around the glass cabinet to hear me. A little accommodation to a customer can go a long way. The food was fine. The atmosphere is stools next to counters. Quite basic.

originalText.text: Awesome place. Brand new. So I go here often to help them with their loans. Food is great. All the workers are so nice

text.text: Awesome place. Brand new. So I go here often to help them with their loans. Food is great. All the workers are so nice

originalText.text:
Love a bagel place around. Love the coffee strong and flavorful. Bagel was a little dry but it was good. The servers were very welcoming, smiling and happy, I can always come here back for a morning smile and good coffee.

Keep shining

text.text:
Love a bagel place around. Love the coffee strong and flavorful. Bagel was a little dry but it was good. The servers were very welcoming, smiling and happy, I can always come here back for a morning smile and good coffee.

Keep shining

originalText.text: Saul, Luis, Jose, lorenzo were so great! The food and service was top notch. We had a family reunion here. While at bagel bar, my boyfriend and I announced our pregnancy to his parents. It was the perfect place to celebrate! The iced coffee and paninis are amazing!!

text.text: Saul, Luis, Jose, lorenzo were so great! The food and service was top notch. We had a family reunion here. While at bagel bar, my boyfriend and I announced our pregnancy to his parents. It was the perfect place to celebrate! The iced coffee and paninis are amazing!!
